function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of emphasis on pandemic control in non-clinical workplace theory","Impact":"Increased risk of disease spread in non-clinical workplaces","Mitigation":"Integration of pandemic control measures into workplace policies and procedures","Technologies":"Digital technologies for remote work and communication","People":"Employees, visitors, and stakeholders in non-clinical workplaces","Owner":"Facility managers and corporate real estate managers"},{"Description":"Reliance on virtual office space without proper management and safety measures","Impact":"Increased risk of disease spread in virtual office environments","Mitigation":"Development of virtual office safety protocols and guidelines","Technologies":"Digital technologies for virtual collaboration and communication","People":"Employees working in virtual office spaces","Owner":"Organizational management and workplace safety authorities"},{"Description":"Inadequate workplace modification practice for pandemic control","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission in the workplace","Mitigation":"Implementation of effective workplace modification strategies for pandemic control","Technologies":"Advanced air filtration systems, contactless technologies, and remote monitoring solutions","People":"Employees, visitors, and stakeholders in the workplace","Owner":"Facility managers and workplace safety authorities"}]}
